articles.title: 'Bikini Killer' Charles Sobhraj Freed From Nepal Jail, To Be Deported To France - NDTV
articles.description: French serial killer Charles Sobhraj, responsible for multiple murders of young foreigners in the 1970s across Asia, was freed on Friday after spending almost 20 years in a Nepali jail.
articles.content:
The court ordered Sobhraj, who had heart surgery in 2017, should be released on health grounds.

articles.title: Vietnam arrests former ambassador to Japan on bribery charges - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Deputy foreign minister, Osaka consul general ensnared in repatriation flight scandal
articles.content:
HANOI -- Vietnam has arrested its previous ambassador to Japan on allegations of accepting bribes when organizing repatriation flights amid the coronavirus pandemic, authorities said Thursday.
